            • Property Detail

              • @org.gradle.api.tasks.OutputDirectory @org.gradle.api.tasks.Optional File incrementalFolder

            • Method Detail

              • protected void doFullTaskAction()

                Actual task action. This is called when a full run is needed, which is always the case if isIncremental() returns false.

              • protected void doIncrementalTaskAction(Map<File, com.android.ide.common.res2.FileStatus> changedInputs)

                Optional incremental task action. Only used if isIncremental() returns true.

                Parameters:
                changedInputs - the changed input files.

              • static List<File> flattenSourceSets(List<? extends com.android.ide.common.res2.SourceSet> resourceSets)

              • protected boolean isIncremental()

                Whether this task can support incremental update.

                Returns:
                whether this task can support incremental update.

              • @org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskAction void taskAction(org.gradle.api.tasks.incremental.IncrementalTaskInputs inputs)

                Actual entry point for the action. Calls out to the doTaskAction as needed.
